originalText.text: Working with Lewis was fantastic! He quickly helped us navigate any questions that we had, and found us a wonderful apartment that we're very excited about. I would highly recommend working with Lewis if you're looking for an apartment in NYC!

text.text: Working with Lewis was fantastic! He quickly helped us navigate any questions that we had, and found us a wonderful apartment that we're very excited about. I would highly recommend working with Lewis if you're looking for an apartment in NYC!

originalText.text: Lewis was fantastic to work with. Clear communication and support throughout the entire process. Lewis reduced the stress that normally comes with finding, applying to, and signing for apartments, and I hope that we get to work with him in the future!

text.text: Lewis was fantastic to work with. Clear communication and support throughout the entire process. Lewis reduced the stress that normally comes with finding, applying to, and signing for apartments, and I hope that we get to work with him in the future!

originalText.text: Lewis is an incredibly competent, polite, and punctual real estate agent. Every aspect of the process was handled with precision, and we successfully rented an apartment through him. We are satisfied with his services and will happily recommend him to our friends.

text.text: Lewis is an incredibly competent, polite, and punctual real estate agent. Every aspect of the process was handled with precision, and we successfully rented an apartment through him. We are satisfied with his services and will happily recommend him to our friends.

originalText.text:
Used Lewis for an apartment rental in NYC in August of 2022. Very happy when initial contact and follow through. Paid him his brokers fee for showing us 1 apartment and very little time on his part. Moved out of apartment in August of 2023 and still have not had our security deposit returned. He has been completely unresponsive in helping us recover the security deposit due us. Lewis represents New City Management (the managing company of the apartment we rented) and when asked point blank if this is how they operate (dragging the security deposit refund out/ not returning it at all) he told me no. After very little effort in looking into New City Management complaint history in the state of New York, found that there is a very long track record of them having complaint after complaint filed against them. If he was unaware of this then he should find a new career. The people and companies you choose to represent are a direct reflection of the business person you are!
After he put us in contact with the non-existent person that was going to resolve this issue he has completely ignored multiple attempts to contact him. Couldn't be more disappointed in a broker and can not endorse him or his behavior in any way.
We will be filing complaints against him and Keller Williams with the State of New York as well as New City Management. Stay away from renting anything from all involved.

originalText.text: Lewis is a super professional person, very kind and helpful. He helped me a lot to find the perfect solution for my needs. I highly recommend him!
